wordGroup: credit rationing 信贷配给；信用分配

sentences.en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的情况。

sentences.en: The municipal authorities here are preparing for food rationing.
sentences.cn: 此地的市政当局正为食物配给制做准备。

sentences.en: The City Council of Moscow has decided that it will begin rationing bread, butter, and meat.
sentences.cn: 莫斯科市议会已经决定开始定量配给面包、黄油和肉。
